mapper.select: SELECT s.study_type, s.study_time, s.study_num_of_people, s.study_contact_type, s.study_space, m.member_name, m.member_id, s.study_subject, s.study_content, s.study_date, s.study_readcount, s.study_status FROM study s, member m WHERE s.study_idx = #{study_idx} AND s.member_idx = m.member_idx
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO study_member VALUES ( (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(CAST(sm.study_mem_idx as unsigned)), 0) + 1 FROM study_member sm) ,#{study_idx} ,(SELECT member_idx FROM member WHERE member_id = #{member_id}) )
